name: Google tricks
short_description:
There’s another key feature related to the search bar itself.
http://www.arel.info/internet/google-tricks/
Start typing in the bar, and the colors of the field and the letters themselves change colors with each new letter typed. Type fast and they flash like a Pink Floyd laser show. Type slowly, and see the new color scheme one letter at a time. It’s a pretty impressive range of colors, more elaborate than the typical Google letters. For all the fun of Google Loco, the search results leave a little to be desired. The swearch results return on the same page as the loco logo (as any custom search results will), so all but one of your results fall below the page fold. 
http://www.arel.info/internet/google-gravity-im-feeling-lucky/
